episodes.title: It Hits the Fan
episodes.plot: Society is almost destroyed when a popular television show uses the word "shit" on the air.

episodes.title: Cripple Fight
episodes.plot: The boys fight to get Big Gay Al reinstated as their scout leader, and Timmy is jealous of the new handicapped kid in town, Jimmy.

episodes.title: Super Best Friends
episodes.plot: Stan enlists the help of an elite team of religious leaders including Jesus and Mohammed to help him rescue Kyle from a cult.

episodes.title: Scott Tenorman Must Die
episodes.plot: Cartman plans an elaborate revenge when an older boy cons him out of money.

episodes.title: Terrance and Phillip: Behind the Blow
episodes.plot: The boys attempt to reunite their idols Terrance & Philip after the Canadian duo has a falling out. Meanwhile, South Park falls under the control of environmentalists.

episodes.title: Cartmanland
episodes.plot: Cartman inherits a large sum of money and uses it to purchase his own amusement park. His resulting success causes Kyle to lose faith in God.

episodes.title: Proper Condom Use
episodes.plot: Improper sex ed classes lead to the boys declaring war on the girls.

episodes.title: Towelie
episodes.plot: The boys try to rescue their new video game system from the hands of a government agency with the help of a talking towel named Towelie.

episodes.title: Osama Bin Laden Has Farty Pants
episodes.plot: The boys come face to face with Osama Bin Laden after they are mistakenly shipped to Afghanistan.

episodes.title: How to Eat with Your Butt
episodes.plot: Cartman puts a picture of Kenny's butt on a milk carton as a prank, but is disturbed when a couple arrives in South Park claiming it was a picture of their missing son.

episodes.title: The Entity
episodes.plot: Kyle's cousin Kyle, a negative Jewish stereotype, comes to town to visit. Meanwhile, Mr. Garrison comes up with an only-slightly more pleasant alternative to airline travel.

episodes.title: Here Comes the Neighborhood
episodes.plot: A class war ensues in South Park when it becomes a hot spot for rich celebrities. Meanwhile, Token feels rejected by his friends and goes to live with lions.

episodes.title: Kenny Dies
episodes.plot: The boys cope with loss when Kenny is hospitalized with a terminal disease. Cartman attempts to save him by legalizing stem cell research.

episodes.title: Butters' Very Own Episode
episodes.plot: Butters' mother snaps and tries to kill her son after the revelation that her husband frequents gay bath houses.
